Title: Missing data schema
Body: There was an error when retrieving the remote data schema.

Title: Missing data schema
Body: The data schema of the data source is missing. Contact us through Intercom.

Title: Bad request
Body: The server cannot process the request due to an apparent client error.

Title: Server Error
Body: An internal server error has occurred. Please try again later.

Title: Automate your Key Results
Body: Track progress automatically with data-source insights.

Title: You're connected to Gtmhub
Body: You can now use SSO to log in.

Title: Password expires in 3 days
Body: Update your password to continue using Gtmhub.

Title: Unstable connection
Body: There is a problem with the connection and we are unable to save changes. We are trying to reconnect...
